Uses of Interface
com.quinsoft.zeidon.config.ZeidonPreferences

  • Packages that use ZeidonPreferences 
    Package Description
    com.quinsoft.zeidon
    Provides all the standard classes and interfaces necessary for client applications written in Zeidon.
    com.quinsoft.zeidon.config
    Provides classes for configuring the Zeidon .Object Engine.
    com.quinsoft.zeidon.standardoe
    Provides the standard Java implementation of the com.quinsoft.zeidon interfaces.
